item.text: In the tenth year that Zedekiah was ruling over Judah the Lord spoke to Jeremiah. That was the same as the eighteenth year of Nebuchadnezzar.
Now at that time, the armies of the king of Babylon were besieging Jerusalem. The prophet Jeremiah was confined in the courtyard of the guardhouse attached to the royal palace of Judah.

For King Zedekiah had confined Jeremiah there after he had reproved him for prophesying as he did. He had asked Jeremiah, “Why do you keep prophesying these things? Why do you keep saying that the Lord says, ‘I will hand this city over to the king of Babylon? I will let him capture it.

<st data-num="04428" class="">King</st> <st data-num="06667" class="">Zedekiah</st> of <st data-num="03063" class="">Judah</st> will <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="04422" class="">escape</st> <st data-num="03027" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="03778" class="">Babylonians</st>.<n id="1" /> He will <st data-num="03588 05414">certainly</st> be <st data-num="05414" class="">handed</st> <st data-num="03027" class="">over to</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> of <st data-num="0894" class="">Babylon</st>. He must <st data-num="01696" class="">answer</st> <st data-num="06310 05973 06310">personally</st> to the king of Babylon and <st data-num="07200" class="">confront</st> him <st data-num="05869" class="">face</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">to</st> <st data-num="05869" class="">face</st>.<n id="2" />
Zedekiah will be carried off to Babylon and will remain there until I have fully dealt with him. I, the Lord, affirm it! Even if you continue to fight against the Babylonians, you cannot win.’”
So now, Jeremiah said, “The Lord’s message came to me,

‘<st data-num="02601" class="">Hanamel</st>, the <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of your <st data-num="01730" class="">uncle</st> <st data-num="07967" class="">Shallum</st>, <st data-num="02009" class="">will</st> <st data-num="0935" class="">come</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> you soon. He will <st data-num="0559" class="">say</st> to you, “<st data-num="07069" class="">Buy</st> my <st data-num="07704 0834">field</st> at <st data-num="06068" class="">Anathoth</st> <st data-num="03588" class="">because</st> you are <st data-num="04941" class="">entitled</st><n id="1" /> as my <st data-num="01353" class="">closest relative</st> to <st data-num="07069" class="">buy</st> it.”’<n id="2" />

And then my cousin Hanamel did come to me in the courtyard of the guardhouse in keeping with the Lord’s message. He said to me, ‘Buy my field that is at Anathoth in the territory of the tribe of Benjamin. Buy it for yourself since you are entitled as my closest relative to take possession of it for yourself.’ When this happened, I recognized that the Lord had indeed spoken to me.

So I <st data-num="07069" class="">bought</st> the <st data-num="07704 0834">field</st> at <st data-num="06068" class="">Anathoth</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">from</st> my <st data-num="01121 01730">cousin</st> <st data-num="02601" class="">Hanamel</st>. I <st data-num="08254" class="">weighed out</st> <st data-num="07651 06235">seven</st> <st data-num="08255" class="">ounces</st> of <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st> and gave <st data-num="03701" class="">it</st> to him to pay for it.<n id="1" />

I <st data-num="03789" class="">signed</st> the <st data-num="05612" class="">deed</st> of purchase,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="02856" class="">sealed</st> it, and <st data-num="05749" class="">had</st> some men <st data-num="05749" class="">serve</st> as <st data-num="05707" class="">witnesses</st> to the purchase.<n id="2" /> I <st data-num="08254" class="">weighed out</st> the <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st> for him on a <st data-num="03976" class="">scale</st>.

There were two copies of the <st data-num="05612" class="">deed</st> of <st data-num="04736" class="">purchase</st>. One was <st data-num="02856" class="">sealed</st> and contained the <st data-num="04687" class="">order</st> of transfer and the <st data-num="02706" class="">conditions</st> of purchase.<n id="1" /> The other was left <st data-num="01540" class="">unsealed</st>.

I <st data-num="03947" class="">took</st> both copies of the <st data-num="05612" class="">deed</st> of <st data-num="04736" class="">purchase</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="05414" class="">gave</st> them <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="01263" class="">Baruch</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="05374" class="">Neriah</st>, the <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="04271" class="">Mahseiah</st>. I gave them to him in the <st data-num="05869" class="">presence</st><n id="2" /> of my <st data-num="01121 01730">cousin</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="02601" class="">Hanamel</st>, the <st data-num="05707" class="">witnesses</st> who had <st data-num="03789" class="">signed</st> the <st data-num="05612" class="">deed</st> of <st data-num="04736" class="">purchase</st>, and <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="03064" class="">Judeans</st> who were <st data-num="03427" class="">housed</st> in the <st data-num="02691" class="">courtyard</st> of the <st data-num="04307" class="">guardhouse</st>.
In the <st data-num="05869" class="">presence</st> of all these people I <st data-num="06680 0559">instructed</st> <st data-num="01263" class="">Baruch</st>,

‘The Lord of Heaven’s Armies, the God of Israel, says, “Take these documents, both the sealed copy of the deed of purchase and the unsealed copy. Put them in a clay jar so that they may be preserved for a long time to come.”’
For the Lord of Heaven’s Armies, the God of Israel, says, ‘Houses, fields, and vineyards will again be bought in this land.’
“After I had given the copies of the deed of purchase to Baruch son of Neriah, I prayed to the Lord,
‘Oh, Sovereign Lord, you did indeed make heaven and earth by your mighty power and great strength. Nothing is too hard for you!
You show unfailing love to thousands. But you also punish children for the sins of their parents. You are the great and powerful God whose name is the Lord of Heaven’s Armies.

You <st data-num="06098" class="">plan</st> <st data-num="01419" class="">great</st> things and you do <st data-num="07227" class="">mighty</st> <st data-num="05950" class="">deeds</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0834 05869">You</st> <st data-num="06491 05921">see</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">everything</st> <st data-num="01121 0120">people</st> <st data-num="01870" class="">do</st>.<n id="2" /> You <st data-num="05414" class="">reward</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">each</st> of them for the <st data-num="01870" class="">way</st> they <st data-num="01870" class="">live</st> and for the <st data-num="06529" class="">things</st> they <st data-num="04611" class="">do</st>.<n id="3" />

You <st data-num="07760" class="">did</st> <st data-num="0226" class="">miracles</st> and <st data-num="04159" class="">amazing deeds</st> in the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> of <st data-num="04714" class="">Egypt</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">that have had</st> <st data-num="02088" class="">lasting</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">effect</st>. By this means you <st data-num="06213" class="">gained</st> both in <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st> and among <st data-num="0120" class="">humankind</st> a <st data-num="08034" class="">renown</st> that lasts to <st data-num="02088" class="">this</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st>.<n id="1" />

You used your <st data-num="02389" class="">mighty</st> <st data-num="03027" class="">power</st> and your <st data-num="05186" class="">great</st> <st data-num="0248" class="">strength</st> to perform <st data-num="0226" class="">miracles</st> and <st data-num="04159" class="">amazing deeds</st> and to bring <st data-num="01419" class="">great</st> <st data-num="04172" class="">terror</st> on the Egyptians. By this means you <st data-num="03318" class="">brought</st> your <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st> <st data-num="03318" class="">out</st> of the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> of <st data-num="04714" class="">Egypt</st>.<n id="1" />

You <st data-num="05414" class="">kept</st> <st data-num="02063" class="">the</st> <st data-num="0776" class="">promise</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> you <st data-num="07650" class="">swore on oath</st> to their <st data-num="01" class="">ancestors</st>.<n id="1" /> You <st data-num="05414" class="">gave</st> them a <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> <st data-num="02100" class="">flowing</st> with <st data-num="02461" class="">milk</st> and <st data-num="01706" class="">honey</st>.<n id="2" />

But when they <st data-num="0935" class="">came in</st> and <st data-num="03423" class="">took possession of</st> it, they did <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="08085" class="">obey</st> <st data-num="06963" class="">you</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">or</st> <st data-num="01980" class="">live</st> as you had <st data-num="08451" class="">instructed</st> them. They did <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="06213" class="">do</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">anything</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> you <st data-num="06680" class="">commanded</st> them to <st data-num="06213" class="">do</st>.<n id="1" /> So you <st data-num="07122" class="">brought</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> <st data-num="02063" class="">this</st> <st data-num="07451" class="">disaster</st> on them.

Even now siege ramps have been built up around the city in order to capture it. War, starvation, and disease are sure to make the city fall into the hands of the Babylonians who are attacking it. Lord, you threatened that this would happen. Now you can see that it is already taking place.
The city is sure to fall into the hands of the Babylonians. Yet, in spite of this, you, Sovereign Lord, have said to me, “Buy that field with silver and have the transaction legally witnessed.”’”
The Lord’s message came to Jeremiah:
“I am the Lord, the God of all humankind. There is, indeed, nothing too difficult for me.
Therefore I, the Lord, say: ‘I will indeed hand this city over to King Nebuchadnezzar of Babylon and the Babylonian army. They will capture it.

The <st data-num="03778" class="">Babylonian</st> soldiers<n id="1" /> that are <st data-num="03898 05921">attacking</st> <st data-num="02063" class="">this</st> <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st> will <st data-num="0935" class="">break into</st> it and <st data-num="03341" class="">set</st> <st data-num="05892 02063">it</st> on <st data-num="0784" class="">fire</st>. They will <st data-num="08313" class="">burn</st> it <st data-num="08313" class="">down</st> along <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="01004" class="">houses</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">where</st> people have <st data-num="03707" class="">made</st> me <st data-num="03707" class="">angry</st> by <st data-num="06999" class="">offering sacrifices</st> to the god <st data-num="01168" class="">Baal</st> and by <st data-num="05258" class="">pouring out</st> <st data-num="05262" class="">drink offerings</st> to <st data-num="0312" class="">other</st> <st data-num="0430" class="">gods</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> their <st data-num="01406" class="">rooftops</st>.<n id="2" />

This will happen because the people of Israel and Judah have repeatedly done what displeases me from their earliest history until now and because they have repeatedly made me angry by the things they have done. I, the Lord, affirm it!

This will happen <st data-num="03588" class="">because</st><n id="1" /> the people of <st data-num="02063" class="">this</st> <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">have aroused</st> my <st data-num="05921 0639">anger</st> and my <st data-num="05921 02534">wrath</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">since</st> the <st data-num="03117 0834">time</st> they <st data-num="01129" class="">built</st> it <st data-num="05704" class="">until</st> <st data-num="03117 02088">now</st>.<n id="2" /> They have made me so angry that I am determined to <st data-num="05493" class="">remove</st><n id="3" /> it <st data-num="05921" class="">from</st> my <st data-num="06440" class="">sight</st>.

I am determined to do so <st data-num="05921" class="">because</st> the <st data-num="01121" class="">people</st> of <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st> and <st data-num="03063" class="">Judah</st> have <st data-num="03707" class="">made</st> me <st data-num="03707" class="">angry</st> <st data-num="05921">with</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> their <st data-num="07451" class="">wickedness</st>—<st data-num="01992" class="">they</st>, their <st data-num="04428" class="">kings</st>, their <st data-num="08269" class="">officials</st>, their <st data-num="03548" class="">priests</st>, their <st data-num="05030" class="">prophets</st>, and especially the <st data-num="0376" class="">people</st> of <st data-num="03063" class="">Judah</st> and the <st data-num="03427" class="">citizens</st> of <st data-num="03389" class="">Jerusalem</st><n id="1" /> have <st data-num="06213" class="">done</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">this wickedness</st>.<n id="2" />

They have <st data-num="06437" class="">turned</st> <st data-num="06203" class="">away</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">from</st> me <st data-num="03808" class="">instead of</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">turning to</st> me.<n id="1" /> I tried <st data-num="07925 03925">over and over again</st><n id="2" /> to <st data-num="03925" class="">instruct</st> them, but they did <st data-num="0369" class="">not</st> <st data-num="08085" class="">listen</st> and <st data-num="03947" class="">respond to</st> <st data-num="04148" class="">correction</st>.<n id="3" />

They <st data-num="07760" class="">set up</st> their <st data-num="08251" class="">disgusting idols</st> in the <st data-num="01004" class="">temple</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> <st data-num="08034" class="">I</st> have <st data-num="07121 05921">claimed for</st> my <st data-num="07121 05921">own</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="02930" class="">defiled</st> it.

They built places of worship for the god Baal in the Valley of Ben Hinnom so that they could sacrifice their sons and daughters to the god Molech. Such a disgusting practice was not something I commanded them to do. It never even entered my mind to command them to do such a thing! So Judah is certainly liable for punishment.’

“You and your people are right in saying, ‘War, starvation, and disease are sure to make this city fall into the hands of the king of Babylon.’ But now I, the Lord God of Israel, have something further to say about this city:

‘I will <st data-num="02005" class="">certainly</st> <st data-num="06908" class="">regather</st> my people from <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">countries</st> <st data-num="0834 08033">where</st> I have <st data-num="05080" class="">exiled</st><n id="1" /> them in my <st data-num="0639" class="">anger</st>, <st data-num="02534" class="">fury</st>, and <st data-num="01419" class="">great</st> <st data-num="07110" class="">wrath</st>. I will <st data-num="07725" class="">bring</st> them <st data-num="07725" class="">back</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="02088" class="">this</st> <st data-num="04725" class="">place</st> and allow them to <st data-num="03427" class="">live</st> here in <st data-num="0983" class="">safety</st>.

They will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> my <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st>, and <st data-num="0589" class="">I</st> will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> their <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st>.<n id="1" />

I will <st data-num="05414" class="">give</st> them a <st data-num="0259" class="">single-minded</st> <st data-num="03820" class="">purpose</st> to live in <st data-num="0259" class="">a</st> <st data-num="01870" class="">way</st> that <st data-num="03605 03117">always</st> <st data-num="03372" class="">shows respect</st> for me. They will want to do that for<n id="1" /> their own <st data-num="02896" class="">good</st> and the good of the <st data-num="01121" class="">children</st> who <st data-num="0310" class="">descend from</st> them.

I will <st data-num="03772" class="">make</st> a <st data-num="05769" class="">lasting</st> <st data-num="01285" class="">covenant</st><n id="1" /> with them <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> I will <st data-num="03808" class="">never</st> <st data-num="07725" class="">stop</st> <st data-num="03190" class="">doing good</st> <st data-num="0310" class="">to</st> them.<n id="2" /> I will <st data-num="05414" class="">fill</st> their <st data-num="03824" class="">hearts</st> and minds with <st data-num="03374" class="">respect</st> for me <st data-num="01115" class="">so that</st><n id="3" /> they will <st data-num="01115" class="">never</st> again <st data-num="05493" class="">turn away</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="05921" class="">from</st> me.
I will take delight in doing good to them. I will faithfully and wholeheartedly plant them firmly in the land.’

“For I, the Lord, say: ‘I will surely bring on these people all the good fortune that I am hereby promising them. I will be just as sure to do that as I have been in bringing all this great disaster on them.

<st data-num="0859" class="">You and your people</st><n id="1" /> are <st data-num="0559" class="">saying</st> that <st data-num="01931" class="">this land</st> will become <st data-num="08077" class="">desolate</st>, <st data-num="0369" class="">uninhabited</st> by either <st data-num="0120" class="">people</st> or <st data-num="0929" class="">animals</st>. You are saying that it will be <st data-num="05414" class="">handed</st> <st data-num="03027" class="">over to</st> the <st data-num="03778" class="">Babylonians</st>.<n id="2" /> But <st data-num="07704" class="">fields</st><n id="3" /> will again be <st data-num="07069" class="">bought</st> in <st data-num="02063" class="">this</st> <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st>.<n id="4" />

Fields will again be bought with silver, and deeds of purchase signed, sealed, and witnessed. This will happen in the territory of Benjamin, the villages surrounding Jerusalem, the towns in Judah, the southern hill country, the foothills, and southern Judah. For I will restore them to their land. I, the Lord, affirm it!’”
